Name: Buster Dragon, Agni
Effect: On Play/On Attack - Give an allied Follower or Ruler +1 Critical Check for the turn. Trigger - When you get a Critical, give an allied Follower or Ruler +1000 Power for the turn.
Awakened Effect: Give an allied Follower or Ruler +1 Critical Check for the turn.

Name: Warring Hound
Effect: If your Guard with this card from your hand, it gains +1000 Boost for each card you have in your Damage Zone more than than your opponent.

Name: Feral Raze
Effect: Destroy opposing Followers whose total Power is equal to or less than 10000. If you have more damage than your opponent, destroy opposing Followers whose total Power is equal to or less than 12000 instead.

Name: Impish Dragoness
Awakened Effect: This turn, an allied Follower or Ruler gains +1000 Power.

Name: Dragon Rider
Effect: Cont - This Follower gains +1 Critical Check.
Awakened Effect: This turn, an allied Follower or Ruler gains +1000 Power.

Name: Chaos Magus
Effect: On Play - If you have 5 or less damage, you can add a card from your hand to your damage. If you do, this turn, give an opposing Unit -7000 Power.

Name: Ironforged Dragoon
Effect: Cont - This Follower gains +1 Critical Check.

Name: Ignis Spirit
Effect: On Play - This turn, give an opposing Follower -3000 Power.
Awakened Effect: This turn, give an opposing Follower -3000 Power.

Name: Sorceror of Storms
Effect: On Play/On Attack - Destroy an opposing Follower with 5000 or less Power.
Awakened Effect: Destroy an opposing Follower with 5000 or less Power.

Name: Dragonic Spirit
Effect: Give an allied Follower Indomitable and "On Attack - This turn, gain +1000 Power" until the start of your next turn.

Name: Fire Lizard
Effect: On Play - Draw a card then shuffle a card from your hand into your deck.
Awakened Effect: Draw a card if you have 2 or less cards in your hand.

Name: Wicked Oni
Effect: Check Zone - During your turn, this card is treated as a Critical.
